fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Culture and media, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Communication

section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
Digital House of Europe Foundation seeks to achieve its aim by supporting  
European Communities with advice and assistance in a neutral and independent way to  
prevent any third party from impeding or abusing  
their digital human rights and to  
anticipate such impediments and abuse. 
 
Digital House of Europe Foundation focuses on supporting European Communities  
by connecting, developing, initiating and facilitating proactively. 
 
Digital House of Europe F 
oundation creates and maintains a hotline for violation of  
digital human rights. 
 
Digital House of Europe Foundation assesses and observes and can act as an  
advocate. 
 
Digital House of Europe Foundation can do research, facilitate research and partipate in research. 
It makes research information available to the European  
Community. 
 
Digital House of Europe Foundation increases the individual’s mobility by ensuring  
that the individual’s own data is or remains available. 
 
Digital House of Europe Foundation is a knowledge institute in the field of digital human rights. 
 
Digital House of Europe Foundation renders advice on digital human rights. 
 
Digital House of Europe Foundation is a source of information about digital human rights. 
 
Digital House of Europe Foundation is the administrator of the smart contracting library. 
 
Digital House of Europe Foundation is the administrator of the validation register concerning the digital new personality for the benefit of scientific and clinical research. 
 
Digital House of Europe Foundation develops and validates the informed consent  
procedures and serves as an ethical committee for digital research.
